description.narrative: This activity (Food Fortification Pakistan) is a component of Supporting Nutrition in Pakistan (SNIP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £26,165,756. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Basic nutrition. , with the following implementing partners: Ernst & Young Pakistan, KPMG Pakistan, Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 24-01-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
